CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(ucinn_ascendv2__Frequency__c, "Monthly"), Amount * 12, IF( ISPICKVAL(ucinn_ascendv2__Frequency__c, "Weekly"), Amount * 52, IF( ISPICKVAL(ucinn_ascendv2__Frequency__c, "Bi-Weekly"), Amount * 26, IF( ISPICKVAL(ucinn_ascendv2__Frequency__c, "Quarterly"), Amount * 4, Amount ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Annual Total
